title: At Royalton Greens YOU are our #1 priority!!!
app_fee: $75 APP FEE + $300 HOLD FEE TOWARDS YOUR DEPOSIT
posting_body: ['WHAT ARE YOU WAITING FOR???', 'DIVE RIGHT INTO A FRESH BEGINNING AT ROYALTON GREENS!', 'Located in the heart of beautiful Strongsville, Ohio!', "It's a place to relax, shop till you drop, enjoy fine dining, engage in recreational activities AND we are a place for you to call HOME!", 'Stroll through our park-like community, hike in the FABULOUS Metroparks, take a toboggan ride and warm your toes with a mug of hot cocoa!', "You can immerse yourself in the beauty of Ohio's four distinct Seasons (plus the STRONGSVILLE EVENT SEASON).", 'Enjoy the many amenities we have to offer and take some time to connect with neighbors, friends, and family!', 'In our backyard, LITERALLY, you can find History, Education, Recreation and Friendship!', 'It is all waiting for you!', 'Royalton Greens Apartments is now offering this Spacious 1 Bedroom Suite for $930 per month + utilities..', '• Water $40 + $5 per additional occupants', '• Trash $8', '• Gas and electric and set up by the resident', '• Spacious, bright floor plans', '• TONS of closet/storage space', '• Garbage Disposal', '• Dishwasher', '• Free outdoor, on-site parking/guest parking', '• 24/7 Laundry Facilities in each building', '• Gas and electric are metered and paid by the resident/individual thermostats', '• Central Air and Heat', '• Plentiful electrical outlets', '• Apartment Building package delivery', '• Extra Storage Space available', 'Community Features:', '• On-site 24-hour Emergency Maintenance', '• 24-hour Fitness Center', '• Large outdoor pool with picnic and grilling areas and a volleyball court', '• Free parking and guest parking', '• Carports available for $40/month', '• Dog "Bark Park" and "Poop Stations" throughout', '• Pet Policy', '• Community/Gathering Room with WIFI and Cable TV', '• On-Site Management and Local Corporate Management', '• Public Transportation Line', 'NEXT DOOR', 'TO:', '* Police Station', '* Library', '* Senior and REC Center', '* Historical Society', '* Recycling Center', '* Tennis, basketball, baseball and football fields', "* A child's dream playground/play areas/ picnic areas and covered gazebo", '* ICE CREAM!!!!', 'AS ALWAYS APARTMENT HOMES ARE ON A FIRST COME FIRST SERVE BASIS SO.....', 'WHAT ARE YOU WAITING FOR???']
